title: Getting off map 30

abstract: 'Melbourne was the place I had left, and was coming back to.'
description: For the fourteen years that Anna Poletti has lived in Melbourne, her various residences have had one thing in common - you can locate them all on map 30 of the Melways street directory. She pays homage to the streets and intersections of her neighbourhood.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002285; Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (September 2008); Active; 2008
